729457f-b.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Schuyler Street
729457f-b.text:
Richmond Terrace, north from Schuyler Street
(left) to Hamilton Avenue, seen across the Baltimore
and Ohio Railroad yards from the ferry terminal viaduct.
The 4-story building on the left is a hotel, occupying
the site of the old Hugots Hotel; tho building on the
right is the Richmond Borough Police Headquarters. In
the background is the tower of Curtis High School.
April 29, 1929
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
The same, a year later.
April, 1930
P. L. Sperr
NO REPR(ODUCCTIONS
729457f-b.folder: Richmond Terrace & Schuyler Street, Staten Island, NY

729456f-c.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Schuyler Street
729456f-c.text:
(1)
Richmond Terrace, at the S.W. corner of Schuyler Street,
showing the Richmond County Court House, the view being across
the Baltimore \& Chio freight yards as seen from the ferry
viaduct. On the left is a portion of the Borough Hall.
April 29, 1929
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
The aase,a year later.
April, 1930
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3)
The Court House, seen from the little park on the south
side of the ferry terminal ramp.
December 26, 1935
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
